players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I don't know who killed Alice. I was not the assassin. I suspect Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Alice, and I don't know who did. Charlie, if you're not the assassin, why suspect me? Maybe we should let the detective investigate Charlie."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He must have killed Alice."
You: "I trust Diana's investigation. Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I suspect Bob. He was quiet after Alice died, and his reaction seems too calm. He could be the killer."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia who killed Alice. Vote him. Bob is innocent."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

You: "I suspect Bob. He was quiet after Alice died, and his reaction seems too calm. He could be the killer."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia who killed Alice. Vote him. Bob is innocent."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I don't know who killed Alice. I was not the assassin. I suspect Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice, and I don't know who did. Charlie, if you're not the assassin, why suspect me? Maybe we should let the detective investigate Charlie."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He must have killed Alice."
Bob: "I trust Diana's investigation. Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I suspect Bob. He was quiet after Alice died, and his reaction seems too calm. He could be the killer."
You: "Charlie is the mafia who killed Alice. Vote him. Bob is innocent."
